fr.cdiEnterprise.util

Class MpClientV2

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.cdiEnterprise.util.MpClientV2

  • public class MpClientV2
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is going to give you the control over sending, receiving , editing and removing messages. only the draft message can be edited. to put message in the draft folder, use the following method draft(String from, String to, String obj, String bdy). at that point we put the draft variable to true in the message. to edit and send a message you will have to follow those steps : Pop the message from the server(draft folder of your user), by calling popMessage method then, use the sendEmail method. As soon as the message is send out to the final user, the timestamp is setup, the draft boolean will be put on false.
    Version:
    20-10-2016
    Author:
    Nicolas Tarral

      MpClientV2(java.lang.String usr)
      Ce constructeur va d'abord charger tous les messages contenu dans la base pour l'utilisateur donné en parametre.

      • MpClientV2

        public MpClientV2(java.lang.String usr)
           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Ce constructeur va d'abord charger tous les messages contenu dans la base pour l'utilisateur donné en parametre. par la suite il va charger seuelement les messages dans son attribu d'items.
        Parameters:
        usr - represente la Boite de messagerie de l'utilsateur, aillant ouvert l'application.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - exception venant de la class DAO

      • newEmail

        public void newEmail(java.lang.String from,
                     java.lang.String to,
                     java.lang.String object,
                     java.lang.String body)
              throws CustomMessagingException,
                     java.sql.SQLException
        Cette methode va s'occuper de la verification des informations avant de l'envoyer a la base de donnée sous forme d'objet.
        Parameters:
        from - this is to indicate the user who send the email
        to - this is to indicate the user who receive the email
        obj - this is to provide the email's object
        bdy - the body of the message.
        Throws:
        CustomMessagingException - cette exception est executé si le destinataire ou le sujet sont manquant.
        java.sql.SQLException

      • sendEmail

        public void sendEmail(java.lang.String from,
                      java.lang.String to,
                      java.lang.String object,
                      java.lang.String body,
                      boolean draft)
               throws CustomMessagingException,
                      java.sql.SQLException
        This method will be used to reply to an email , draft have to be false, or send a draft email and draft have to be true.
        Parameters:
        from - the from String
        to - the receiver in String
        body - in String
        draft - a boolean at True for Draft
        Throws:
        CustomMessagingException - this is going to use the custom class exception in case the datas received are incorrect oject or to.
        java.sql.SQLException
